artist: Manufacturer: Durable Toy and Novelty Corporation
inscription:
Inscriptions

on bottom, incised: [MFD. BY / THE DURABLE TOY & NOVELTY CO. / OFFICE - - - FACTORY / NEW YORK CITY - CLEVELAND. O. / PAT. APPLIED FOR] and [MADE IN / F.H. 28 / U.S.A.]; on bottom, in yellow: [K]
life_date: New York and Cleveland, est. c. 1912
object_name: Uncle Sam's Three-Coin Register Bank (registering) still bank
title: Uncle Sam's Three-Coin Register Bank (registering) still bank
